languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт недоверчиво хмурится.{/n} "Подобные слова полнятся радостью, но позже выльются в реку вины и сомнений. Горькой траве не стать душистым цветком. Не убеждай себя, что ничего не было".

{n}Yrliet frowns distrustfully{/n} "These words are full of joy, but soon they will flow into a river of doubt and guilt. Bitter grass may never become a fragrant flower. Do not pretend that it never happened."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт недоверчиво хмурится.{/n} "Подобные слова полнятся радостью, но позже выльются в реку вины и сомнений. Горькой траве не стать душистым цветком. Не убеждай себя, что ничего не было".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet scowls distrustfully{/n} "Such words are full with glee, but soon will flow into a river of doubts and guilt. The bitter grass may never become a fragrant flower. Don't assure yourself that there hadn't been anything."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet scowls distrustfully{/n} "Such words are full with glee, but soon will flow into a river of doubts and guilt. The bitter grass may never become a fragrant flower. Don't assure yourself that there hadn't been anything."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特不太赞同地皱起了眉。{/n}“这话虽然说得轻巧，但它很快就会淹没在怀疑与歉疚的洪流中。杂草永远不会变成鲜花。我们不该自欺欺人，假装一切不曾发生。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet frowns distrustfully{/n} "These words are full of joy, but soon they will flow into a river of doubt and guilt. Bitter grass may never become a fragrant flower. Do not pretend that it never happened."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特不太赞同地皱起了眉。{/n}“这话虽然说得轻巧，但它很快就会淹没在怀疑与歉疚的洪流中。杂草永远不会变成鲜花。我们不该自欺欺人，假装一切不曾发生。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet frunce el ceño, recelosa.{/n} «Son palabras jubilosas, pero no tardarán en desembocar en un río de dudas y culpabilidad. La mala hierba no puede germinar en una flor fragante. No finjamos que no ha pasado nada».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet frowns distrustfully{/n} "These words are full of joy, but soon they will flow into a river of doubt and guilt. Bitter grass may never become a fragrant flower. Do not pretend that it never happened."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet frunce el ceño, recelosa.{/n} «Son palabras jubilosas, pero no tardarán en desembocar en un río de dudas y culpabilidad. La mala hierba no puede germinar en una flor fragante. No finjamos que no ha pasado nada».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet se renfrogne.{/n} « Ces paroles sont pleines de joie, mais elles se changeront bien vite en un flot de doute et de culpabilité. L'herbe amère ne donne jamais naissance à une fleur odorante. Ne faites pas comme s'il ne s'était rien passé. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet frowns distrustfully{/n} "These words are full of joy, but soon they will flow into a river of doubt and guilt. Bitter grass may never become a fragrant flower. Do not pretend that it never happened."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet se renfrogne.{/n} « Ces paroles sont pleines de joie, mais elles se changeront bien vite en un flot de doute et de culpabilité. L'herbe amère ne donne jamais naissance à une fleur odorante. Ne faites pas comme s'il ne s'était rien passé. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet verzieht misstrauisch das Gesicht{/n} "Diese Worte sind voller Freude, doch schon bald werden sie in einen Fluss voller Zweifel und Schuld fließen. Bitteres Grass wird nie zu einer duftenden Blume. Gebt nicht vor, das alles wäre nie passiert."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet frowns distrustfully{/n} "These words are full of joy, but soon they will flow into a river of doubt and guilt. Bitter grass may never become a fragrant flower. Do not pretend that it never happened."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet verzieht misstrauisch das Gesicht{/n} "Diese Worte sind voller Freude, doch schon bald werden sie in einen Fluss voller Zweifel und Schuld fließen. Bitteres Grass wird nie zu einer duftenden Blume. Gebt nicht vor, das alles wäre nie passiert."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは不信もあらわに顔をしかめる。{/n}「この言葉は喜びに満ちているが、やがて疑いと罪の川に流れ込むだろう。苦い草が香り高い花になることはないかもしれない。なかったことにしてはいけない」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet frowns distrustfully{/n} "These words are full of joy, but soon they will flow into a river of doubt and guilt. Bitter grass may never become a fragrant flower. Do not pretend that it never happened."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは不信もあらわに顔をしかめる。{/n}「この言葉は喜びに満ちているが、やがて疑いと罪の川に流れ込むだろう。苦い草が香り高い花になることはないかもしれない。なかったことにしてはいけない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, şüpheyle kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Bu sözler neşeyle dolu ama yakında şüphe ve suçluluk nehrine karışacaklar. Çorak otlardan güzel kokulu çiçekler filizlenmez. Olanlar olmamış gibi davranma."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet frowns distrustfully{/n} "These words are full of joy, but soon they will flow into a river of doubt and guilt. Bitter grass may never become a fragrant flower. Do not pretend that it never happened."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, şüpheyle kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Bu sözler neşeyle dolu ama yakında şüphe ve suçluluk nehrine karışacaklar. Çorak otlardan güzel kokulu çiçekler filizlenmez. Hiç olmamış gibi davranma."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
